re recommended for prevention of infection.
/circle6 All objects that come in contact with the patient should be considered potentially 
contaminated.
/circle6 Every person (members of the community/patients/health-care personnel) must be 
considered potentially infectious.
/circle6 If an object is disposable it should be discarded appropriately as waste. If it is reusable 
then transmission of infective agents must be prevented by decontamination, cleaning, 
disinfection or sterilisation.
KEY M
